isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR opening WEATHER SEALS

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Opening Weather Seals on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 113 for Items in parentheses.
A primary rubber weather seal (Item 1) and secondary rubber weather seal (Item 3) provides a weather tight seal around cab door when door is closed.

step1.para: Position secondary rubber weather seal (Item 3) at the cab door opening weather seal flange (Item 4) of the top and front of cab door opening. Carefully push secondary rubber weather seal onto the cab door opening weather seal flange until it is completely seated, driver side shown.

Position primary rubber weather seal (Item 1) at the cab door opening weather seal flange (Item 2) all the way around cab door opening. Carefully push primary rubber weather seal onto the cab door opening weather seal flange all the way around cab door opening until it is completely seated, driver side shown.

Install cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover. Refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side primary rubber weather seal and secondary rubber weather seal on front cab door opening of standard cab, extended cab and crew cab models.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Cab Door Opening Weather Seals on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 114 for Items in parentheses.
A primary rubber weather seal (Item 1) and secondary rubber weather seal (Item 3) provides a weather tight seal around cab door when door is closed.

step1.para: Position secondary rubber weather seal (Item 3) at the cab door opening weather seal flange (Item 4) of the top and front of cab door opening. Carefully push secondary rubber weather seal onto the cab door opening weather seal flange until it is completely seated, driver side shown.

Position primary rubber weather seal (Item 1) at the cab door opening weather seal flange (Item 2) all the way around cab door opening. Carefully push primary rubber weather seal onto the cab door opening weather seal flange all the way around cab door opening until it is completely seated, driver side shown.

Install cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover. Refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side primary rubber weather seal and secondary rubber weather seal on rear cab door opening of crew cab models.
